name: Whale Cafe
title: Order
notOpenDescription: Ordering is available starting at 10 a.m. daily.
quotaDescription: Thank you for your patronage! Unfortunately, Whale Cafe's production capabilities are limited. There have been {{count}} cups ordered today, which exceeds the quota of {{quota}}.

activeOrder.title: Active Order
activeOrder.description: Whale Cafe has a cause to support. All of your purchases aid charity causes.
activeOrder.orderInfo: You haven't paid for this order yet:
activeOrder.qr: Please scan the following QR code to pay.
activeOrder.qrInfo: Please add a remark noting your order number and name when paying!
activeOrder.alreadyPaid: Already paid? Please contact us for help.

confirm.title: Confirm Your Order
confirm.onSiteMatchFailed: Cannot find a user associated with this name. You will not be able to earn points with this purchase.
confirm.waitError: Failed to load wait time information.
confirm.waitLoading: You will be waiting for approximately ... minutes.
confirm.waitTime_one: You will be waiting for approximately {{count}} minute.

confirm.payment: Please be ready to pay <1><2>in-person</2> after getting your drink.</1>
